ratings.comment: Sabina is an intelligent woman and is very accessible outside of class! She is very knowledgeable in the Spanish language and Spanish culture in general, and does a superb job of presenting content in class in a coherent, concise manner. You must have a strong command of Spanish for her to grade you favorably, but she is always willing to help!

Her slides are often hard to understand and they are mostly photos of the textbook. She excels in giving feedback and in taking suggestions. There is book work due every week. This class is graded on hhow much you improve in your writing, which is subjective.

Fantastic! Definitely read the syllabus for the attendance and grading policies; there are some things that she doesn't mention that are pretty important. She definitely cares about students, and always will help you if you ask for it. Participate, turn things in on time, and ask questions/be willing to make mistakes in class, and you're set.
Sabina is the best! Great professor that cares about her students. Highly recommend trying to get her as your professor!

Sabina is an amazing teacher. She is always willing to help you when you ask for her, and she's seems super excited to teach. In the class itself, there's a lot of daily homework, but it's not too difficult to complete. She was very good at letting people know when stuff is due. Very kind, funny, and down to Earth. Definitely would take again.

Sabina is a really great teacher. Also, she is very unlike other teachers you may have in that she is young, hip, and cool (I mean... she has airpods). Sabina "says" you need to use Spanish from the beginning of class all the way to the end, but I never did and I was okay. You definitely should have her but there are a lot of assignments so yeah.

Sabina is a great teacher. She has helped me understand Spanish better than any other Spanish teacher I've had. There is a lot of homework, but it is so worth it and will make you understand things very well. Take this class!

Sabina is the best Spanish teacher that I've ever had. The class by itself isn't too terribly challenging, but some of the more detailed grammar material is difficult to comprehend. Sabina makes this material more understandable by presenting it in a clear manner. She is funny, kind, and super caring; she's always willing to go the extra mile.

Sabina is great! She explains things really well and is always willing to help if you need it. She also tries her best to make prompts in class relatable to the students. This makes it easy to participate in class. Would for sure take her again.
